        public void setTrack(int trackId)
        Set the previous track log the target should use for speed/distance values.
        Parameters:
        trackId - the track to use

      • getCurrentSpeed

        public float getCurrentSpeed(long elapsedTime)
        Returns the speed of the target elapsedTime after the start of the track, or simply the speed value if it has been set with setSpeed.
        Parameters:
        elapsedTime - since the start of the track in milliseconds. Often taken from a GPStracker.getElapsedTime().
        Returns:
        speed in m/s

      • getCumulativeDistanceAtTime

        public double getCumulativeDistanceAtTime(long time)
        Calculates travelled distance on track between start and time NOTE: Updates internal state (distance += elapsed distance since last call)
        Parameters:
        time - in milliseconds
        Returns:
        distance in meters

      • hasFinished

        public boolean hasFinished()
        Previous track logs have a length, so will finish at some point. Use this method to find out whether we've got to the end of the pre-recorded track.
        Returns:
        true if the target track has played all the way through, false otherwise
